releaseMessage: You can listen to "¿Qué vamos a hacer?" now!

info.title: ¿Qué vamos a hacer?
info.subtitle: Already available
info.text: You can already listen in every platform '¿Qué vamos a hacer?', the fourth single from our future LP. A boy and a girl meet at a '90s party, they like each other, and when the night ends, expectations cross their path... find out how the story ends!

pressKit.title: Press kit
pressKit.text: Here you can download our press kit

20240906.title: Fiestas de la Melonera
20240906.text: On Friday, September 6th at 8:00 PM, we look forward to seeing you all at the fairgrounds of the Fiestas de la Melonera in the Arganzuela district. The party is guaranteed... See you there!

stayTuned: At this time we haven't any gig scheduled soon. Stay tuned!

presave.title: ¿Qué vamos a hacer?
presave.subtitle: Premieres on June 28
presave.text: On June 28, we premiere '¿Qué vamos a hacer?'. A boy and a girl meet at a '90s party, they like each other, and when the night ends, expectations cross their path... discover what happens before anyone else!

contest.fib: Vote for us to play at FIB!

mercadoMotores.title: Mercado de Motores
mercadoMotores.subtitle: Full show on Youtube
mercadoMotores.text: You can already watch our latest full live show at Mercado de Motores in our Youtube channel. If you want to hear our new forthcoming releases in a live format... Don't miss it out!
